SEARCH
Module blackjack
Package blackjack

Class BlackjackLogic

java.lang.Object
blackjack.BlackjackLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlackjackGameSimulator
public abstract class BlackjackLogic extends Object
abstract class to house logic functions for the game of blackjack. Abstract class implementation with static methods - methods can be called by any other object
Author:
Michael Baker

  • Method Details

    • checkForWinningHand

      public static boolean checkForWinningHand(Card[] hand)
      Static function that checks if the hand provided is a winner
      Parameters:
      hand - - An array of card objects representing an actors hand
      Returns:
      - Returns true of the card total is exactly equal to 21
      precondition
      - Expects an n-element array of card objects
      postcondition
      - Will return a booolean type - true if the hand contains exactly 21 and false otherwise

    • cardCounter

      public static int cardCounter(Card[] hand)
      static function that counts the sum of the points held in the hand
      Parameters:
      hand - - array of Card objects
      Returns:
      an integer representing the value of the cards
      precondition
      - Expects an n-element array of card objects
      postcondition
      - Will return an integer type equal to the value of the hand. If there are aces in the hand, the ace will always be assumed to be 1 unless it can be added to the sum of the current "static" cards (2-K) without exceeding 21.

    • updateGameState

      public static void updateGameState(int newGameState)
      public static function to be used by the player and dealer classes to announce if/when they have won
      Parameters:
      newGameState - - the value to change the game state to
      precondition
      - The function expects that the input is one of the predefined game states in the GameStateVariables interface
      postcondition
      - Updates the gameState static variable shared with the BlackjackGameSimulator

    • solveUnknownGameState

      public static int solveUnknownGameState(Card[] dealerHand, Card[] playerHand)
      Static function to determine who has the better hand in the case that neither player reaches 21
      Parameters:
      dealerHand - - Array of Card objects that contains the Dealer's cards
      playerHand - - Array of Card objects that contains the Player's cards
      Returns:
      - integer containing one of the predefined game state variables
      precondition
      - this function assumes that the dealer's hand is first and the player's hand is second, there is no check to ensure this is true
      postcondition
      - the output of this function will only ever be the integers stored in one of the three game completion static final variables defined above
